transArray.content: The front desk service is particularly friendly and the breakfast environment is great. It's a self-service style. It's four hours from 7 to 11 o'clock. It's really great. It's a great experience. I'll stay there often in the future.

Hello dear guest! Thank you for choosing to stay at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel and recommending our service attitude and breakfast. The hotel provides guests with a rich and varied buffet breakfast for free from 7 a.m. to 10 a.m. every day. The dining time is ample to meet your different time periods. Your affirmation is the greatest encouragement to our work. We look forward to meeting you again. I wish you all the best! Manager: Ren Yuanyuan
